Axe.Name: Bloodlust
Axe.Effect: Whenever the user deals 15+ damage with an attack, or takes 15+ damage due to a foe's attack, they gain 1 stack of Rage, max 4.

Axe.Name: Feral Chop
Axe.Effect: This inflicts +1 damage for each Rage stack the user has.

Axe.Name: Power Swing
Axe.Effect: The user may spend any number of Rage. This move's MR is lowered by 1 for every stack of Rage spent.

Axe.Name: Brutal Strike
Axe.Effect: The user may consume stacks of Rage. For every stack consumed, this attack gains +2 critical hit range.

Axe.Name: Chain Axe
Axe.Effect: The user gains an additional stack of Rage from this attack.

Axe.Name: Sever
Axe.Effect: The user may spend stacks of Rage. For every stack consumed, this attack gains +1 hit.

Axe.Name: Vindictive
Axe.Effect: The user gains two stacks of Rage every time they kill a foe.

Axe.Name: Wide Slash
Axe.Effect: The user may spend two Rage stacks to make this attack Cone 2.

Axe.Name: Gash
Axe.Effect: The target is inflicted with Bleed 5/1. The user may consume up to two stacks of Rage when they use this attack, before accuracy. For every stack consumed, the bleed lasts an additional round.

Axe.Name: Franciscate
Axe.Effect: The user is inflicted with Seal/1. They may spend 1 stack before accuracy to negate this status.

Axe.Name: Amped Strike
Axe.Effect: This attack deals an additional X damage, where X = the number of Rage stacks the user has * 4. On a hit, the user then loses all of their Rage stacks.

Hammer.Name: Cyclone Sweep
Hammer.Effect: X = 1 + the number of targets hit.

Hammer.Name: Storm Strike
Hammer.Effect: The user moves as close to the original target as possible, and the original target is Slowed/1.

Hammer.Name: Masonry
Hammer.Effect: The user may choose any unoccupied space in range and create a Stone tile there. This tile has 1 HP, 2/2 EVAs and may be targeted for attacks.

Hammer.Name: Crush
Hammer.Effect: The target is pushed 2 tiles away. If the target cannot be pushed the full distance, this attack deals an extra 1d10+4. This extra damage is also dealt to the obstruction, if it is an entity.

Hammer.Name: Earth Render
Hammer.Effect: Within Burst 2 of the melee target, the user may choose to replace up to 3 unoccupied tiles with broken. These broken tiles last 3 rounds, until the user decides to remove them, or until the user dies.

Hammer.Name: Lagging Spin
Hammer.Effect: The user may select one target within range. This move gains extra dice equal to the target's MP minus the user's MP, but no less than 0. Max +3 dice.

Hammer.Name: Fissure
Hammer.Effect: The target is Slowed/1. Foes in Line 3 behind the target take half the damage rolled and are Slowed/1.

Hammer.Name: Shockwave Slam
Hammer.Effect: The user may push any foe within Burst 2 of the target one space away from the target.

Hammer.Name: Gravity Slam
Hammer.Effect: Before accuracy, the user may choose an entity within Splash 2 and pull into any tile in Splash 1. This pull ignores the user.

Tomahawk.Name: Heavy Weapon
Tomahawk.Effect: The user has +1 accuracy on all ranged attacks, but cannot use Backstep.

Tomahawk.Name: Tomahawk Toss
Tomahawk.Effect: If used from full range, this attack has +4 damage.

Tomahawk.Name: Kip Up
Tomahawk.Effect: This may only be used if the user has targeted a Foe/Ally in Melee range in the last round. The target is pushed up to 3 tiles (If the target is the user, user chooses direction). The user's movement action is then disabled for the rest of their turn.

Tomahawk.Name: Piercing Blow
Tomahawk.Effect: The target is inflicted with 2 Bleed/1. If used in melee, the bleed is increased to 7/1.

Tomahawk.Name: Focused Fling
Tomahawk.Effect: This move has a MR of X, where X = 5 - The range this move is used at.

Tomahawk.Name: Kinetic Throw
Tomahawk.Effect: This attack has X - 1 dice, where X is the range this move is used at.

Tomahawk.Name: Repulse Slice
Tomahawk.Effect: Foes cannot enter the user's melee for one round.

Tomahawk.Name: Continental Crash
Tomahawk.Effect: The user may replace two unoccupied tiles adjacent to them with broken. Foes who end their turn with at least one of these brokens in melee take 10 damage. These tiles revert back to the original after 3 rounds, or when the user dies.

Tomahawk.Name: Two-Handed
Tomahawk.Effect: This attack has Splash 1 if used outside of Range 3.

Tomahawk.Name: Line-Out
Tomahawk.Effect: This attack inflicts +4 damage on the second target in the line and +8 on the third.

Tomahawk.Name: Razor Rust
Tomahawk.Effect: The target is inflicted with 6 Cripple/1.

Tomahawk.Name: Supreme Strike
Tomahawk.Effect: This attack can only be used from maximum range, and gains +dice equal to the number of times the user has pushed any foe with weapon abilities.
